name: Jurassic Sniper 3D
description:
AIM and SHOOT! Compete in Jurassic sea battle grounds where Megalodon and Mosasaurs collide!

Enemies are all over the place. Can you survive the deadly waters?

It’s showtime.

Features :
- Free to play!
- A wide variety of exciting Jurassic sea dinosaurs to hunt
- A wide variety of modern weapons
- Stunning 3D visuals and graphics
